name: Nan OptiPro 1 Milk Powder (0 to 6 months)
description: Client and husband are currently facing financial struggles due to unstable employment, and thus face difficulties in providing basic necessities for their infant's needs such as milk powder & diapers.

name: Diapers and Milk Powder
description:
Another family of 6 have 2 school-going children but are currently struggling financially as husband is the sole breadwinner working as parcel deliverer while wife has to stay home to care for 6 year old son who has autism although she hopes to work when she finds him a childcare. Wife is trying to wean him off diapers and milk powder but because he is autistic, she has been facing difficulties even with KKH's help. 

She is in need of Merries XXL pants and Dugro 4 milk powder to last her the next 2 weeks of the month as there were high medical expenses in the family this month.

Thank you for the help and assistance towards this family.

Older boy doesn't eat well so he is supplementing his diet with NAN Optipro Kid Stage 4. The younger boy is lactose-intolerant and is on Mamil Gold Soy Milk. 
Due to additional expenses of younger sibling's surgery and transport cost ferrying from home to hospital, cost of milk powder is a strain on family's finances.

Client is the main caregiver to her 3-years-old daughter who suffers from eczema, as well as an elderly mother with chronic illness, who underwent toe amputation before due to poorly-controlled diabetes. contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way

name: Electric Water Heater - With Installation
description:
Family of 3. 

Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: 3 Wall Fans (Includes installation)
description:
Family lives in public rental flat and have 1 pri school child and a 8-month-old baby. 
The house is crowded and stuffy. 
Father is the sole breadwinner doing food deliveries and mother is a home maker. 
Client is requesting for 3 wall fans to circulate the air at home.
Thank you.

name: Shower Water Heater
description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. 
However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.

name: Washing Machine (Top Load)
description: Family of 3 requires a washing machine (top load) as their current one has broken down. Parents have medical issues and have unstable employment and hence unable to afford one.

name: Water Heater
description: An elderly female who is known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) stays alone & has no family support. She requested for a preferable new water heater as she does not have one & finds it increasingly challenging to use the kettle to boil hot water to shower. Please kindly take note that the fees for the delivery & installation needs to be borne by donor. Pls kindly contact May at 83686286 if you are keen to help this elderly. We appreciate if the donor can arrange for delivery & installation of the water heater directly to the elderly's home at Blk 93 Henderson Rd #08-218 S150093. For more information on THKMC, pls visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Fridge
description: An elderly male who is known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) stays alone & has no family support. name: Washing Machine (Top Load)

contact.name: Charmaine Pang

name: Water Heater
description: Client has no water heater at home and was advised by her physiotherapist to soak her back under hot water to loosen her muscles for her health condition. She is unable to afford a water heater as family is under financial assistance and the bulk of their assistance goes to their day-to-day expenses.

name: Shower Heater
description: The family is in need of the shower heater and installation. The existing heater was mal-functioned. Kindly contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for more details. Thank you!

name: Groceries
description:
Client is a father of two, and is undergoing a divorce, and also facing more than one medical procedures within this month. As he is a self-employed taxi driver, during his recovery period, he would not be able to earn any income, and would run into difficulties meeting his basic needs, and taking care of his children. As such, client would benefit from fresh rations such as fresh meat and whole foods which are nutritious for his recovery and for his children. 
Grocery list: 
Fresh Meat -3kg (chicken, fish), 
Rice - 10kg, 
Condiments(salt, pepper, soy sauce), Cooking oil - 1 litre, 
Bread and spread (butter and jam), 
Diapers (Drypers XL & XXL)
Milk (ISOMIL stage 3 & FRISOGOLD stage 4), Soap & Shampoo Toothpaste Toilet rolls.

name: Breast Milk Storage Bag
description:
Client is from a family of 7, comprising of client, her husband and 5 children, aged 1, 2, 4, 7 and 8. Client is the main caregiver to her children, and is expecting with another child due next month. Client's husband is the sole breadwinner of the family, and his income is insufficient to manage the family's daily expenses and household bills. As they have been struggling with their daily necessities, they have been unable to afford baby items for their upcoming newborn.

As such, case worker would like to appeal for the family for donations for a breast milk storage bag in order to help the family manage the expenses of baby items for their newborn.

name: water heater system
description: Elderly requires a new water heater system. Elderly is on wheelchair most of the time as she has an amputated left leg. Now relies on boiling water when she need warm water to shower. However, due to her mobility, carrying the kettle to the bathroom can be inconvenient and dangerous. Would require assistance for installation of water heater system as well.

1. Wet food (Aastas Cat Soupy Stew Tuna)
2. Dry food (NicePets Premium Pro Meal)
3. Litter sand (Aatas Cat Kuick Klump)
4. Milk for kittens

name: Groceries Needs

The family faces chronic financial difficulties due to debts, and coupled with no income now, they are not able to make ends meet. 
Request for NTUC vouchers to cover the family's basic necessities and fresh groceries.
Thank you.

name: Sofa
description: Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 during office hours or email to Odelia.Teo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client has a medical condition (Chari Malformation) where she experiences symptoms including pain, migraines and fainting spells, which affected her physical ability to work and had recently left her job. She recently underwent her third surgery in December 2021. Since she left her job, the family has been facing further financial constraints as her husband has been the sole breadwinner supporting the family of 6 children and Client’s elderly mother, who goes for kidney dialysis. Due to space and financial constraints, Client has been sleeping on her sofa throughout the years, which is second hand and was disposed by her neighbors. The sofa is on the verge of being unusable. Will appreciate a sofa with a width above 200cm, that is large and in good condition.

description:
Client has 5 children, and is the main caregiver. 
Her husband is the only breadwinner of the family. 
Hence, the family experiences high stress from caregiving stress, limited financial resources and other stressors.
Thank you.

name: Electric Wheelchair

name: Ramp
description: Client is terminally ill and requires ramp for his toilet so commode can be pushed into toilet for showering/toileting.  Client is deteriorating and is having troubles ambulating and going to the toilet on his own. Patient is foreigner and hence does not qualify for any government grants, family would benefit from in-kind support to alleviate their financial burdens for patient's medical related expenses. Kindly contact me at 84282545.

name: Personal Mobility Aid
description:
Mr Seah is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). During his younger years, he fell from a tree and injured his spine. Since then, Mr Seah has been wheelchair bounded and as he lives alone, he relies on the PMA for his daily commute for food and groceries. Recently, his PMA started breaking down, with the battery’s lifespan going extremely short. He faces the risk of being stuck outside when the PMA suddenly runs out of power.
  
THKMC is looking for a new/used motorized Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) for Mr Seah to continue independence and mobility in the community.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact case worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg.   
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: Metal Stove

name: PUB Gas stove (NOT LPG) (NEED PUB) - With installation

Family of 3. 
Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

name: Double Gas Stoves

However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.
